name: JLM Partners
tag_list: public-relations, corporate-communications, mobile, cable, wireless, consumer-electronics, consulting
overview:
JLM Partners, Inc. is a strategic corporate communications firm serving clients in the cable, wireless, consumer electronics, and digital media sectors.

Collectively, our staff has served in leading communications roles for some of the world’s most influential tech companies and organizations, including: National Cable & Telecommunications Association (NCTA), AT&T Wireless, HBO, Cable in the Classroom, Nortel, RealNetworks, Siemens, and others. We take only a limited number of clients in order to ensure that we deliver what we promise – the full time involvement of our senior people.

Over the years, JLM has advised a wide range of clients including Amazon.com, Big Band Networks, Cisco, CTAM, Arris/C-COR, Clearwire, Hillcrest Laboratories, Lennar, Motorola, MTV, NetMotion Wireless, NetShelter Technology Media, NDS, ThinkAnalytics, RealNetworks, Zoove, and other technology leaders. We take only a limited number of clients in order to insure that we deliver what we promise – the full time involvement of our senior people.
